original_definition: 'closed fronted local space heater' means a local space heater, using gaseous or liquid fuels, of which the fire bed and combustion gases are sealed from the space in which the product is fitted and which is sealed to a chimney or fireplace opening or requires a flue duct for the evacuation of products of combustion;
generated_definition: NO JSON AS AN OUTPUT OBTAINED

Article 2: ‘liquid fuel local space heater’ means anopen fronted local space heateror aclosed fronted local space heater using liquid fuel;
‘gaseous fuel local space heater’ means an open fronted local space heater or a closed fronted local space heater using gaseous fuel;
‘liquid fuel local space heater’ means an open fronted local space heater or a closed fronted local space heater using liquid fuel;

‘closed fronted local space heater’ means a local space heater, using gaseous or liquid fuels, of which the fire bed and combustion gases are sealed from the space in which the product is fitted and which is sealed to a chimney or fireplace opening or requires a flue duct for the evacuation of products of combustion;
‘gaseous fuel local space heater’ means anopen fronted local space heateror aclosed fronted local space heater using gaseous fuel;
Article 9: emissions of NOx byopen fronted local space heaters andclosed fronted local space heaters using gaseous or liquid fuels shall not exceed 130 mg/kWhinput based on GCV;
